description: This file contains CSS styles and variables for managing themes in the interactive tic-tac-toe frontend application. It defines light and dark theme colors, layouts, and responsive design elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with default styling and transitions.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the main application interface.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo styling with animations in the application.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the button that toggles between light and dark themes.
